name: AlwaysLearning
0:
”Alexa, open Always Learning”
”Alexa, start Always Learning”
”Alexa, launch Always Learning”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: always learning
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Always Learning Skill is a tool to help you learn using a voice forward solution.

The content in this skill is presented in a question and answer format and allows you to review science subjects or terms indexed from the content. 

With the help of the Activity section of your Alexa app on your phone, you will be able to engage and navigate through the content and chapters.

This version of Always Learning covers the key concepts you would encounter in an introductory college-level biology course or AP Biology high school course. The chapters include:

- Prokaryotes & Eukaryotes
- Viruses
- The Eukaryotic Cell
- Mitosis & Meiosis
- Genetics
- Evolution
- DNA Synthesis
- Protein Synthesis
- Cellular Respiration
- Enzymes & Metabolism

There are 230+ questions and answers and half the content is available for free with in skill purchase options available for full access to the content.

To navigate through the skill you can choose a chapter, ask for a question to be repeated, and search for terms.

We are actively working on adding more content and subjects - we hope you enjoy and feel free to contact us at www.alwayslearningproject.com if you have any suggestions or comments!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
